title: Maxi Dog Takes a Bath
description: Maxi Dog Takes a Bath Animal Stories for Children 3 This is delightful story about Maxi Dog. Maxi Dog was a filthy Doggy. He would play in the mud and muddy water all day, run around sweaty, and never wash up before meals. If your kids love dogs, rabbits and animal stories they will adore this children book. This children's book is sure to please any animal story fan. To spend a pleasant moment with your kid, Buy Animal Stories for Children 3 Children's Book Animal Stories Book 3 Great Animal Children's Book!
author: Sam Dawn
